## Mixed Output Types

```{python}
#| label: stdout_only
print("This is stdout")
print("Line 2")
```

```{python}
#| label: result_only
42 + 8
```

```{python}
#| label: stderr_only
import sys
sys.stderr.write("This is stderr\n")
```

```{python}
#| label: mixed_stdout_result
print("Some output")
"Final result"
```

```{python}
#| label: html_display
from IPython.display import display, HTML
display(HTML('<b>Bold text</b>'))
print("After HTML display")
```

```{python}
#| label: empty_cell
pass
```

```{python}
#| label: multiline_result
"""This is
a multiline
string result"""
```
